author: Football Italia staff
title: Filippinis & Scuffet lose loved ones
description: The Filippini twins and Simone Scuffet are in mourning after two of their close family members died from coronavirus.  	Teresa Filippini, mother of ex-Brescia and Lazio midfielders Antonio [pictured] and Emanuele, passed away at the age of 74 earlier today af…
content:
The Filippini twins and Simone Scuffet are in mourning after two of their close family members died from coronavirus.
Teresa Filippini, mother of ex-Brescia and Lazio midfielders Antonio [pictured] and Emanuele, passed away at the age of 74 earlier today aft… [+544 chars]
